jobDescription: Developed RAG-based applications leveraging LangChain, open-source LLMs, and vector databases to enable context-aware retrieval and intelligent decision-making.
jobActivities: Designed and implemented RAG-based solutions using LangChain and vector databases like Qdrant and FAISS for efficient information retrieval.
Built POC Chat-with-Database applications utilizing open/closed source embedding models and LLMs to enhance data-driven insights.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and refine a RAG-based POC application, ensuring scalability and optimal performance.
